item.title: Swimwear Support Solutions
item.media:keywords: Swimwear, Swimsuit, Bathing suit, Swimming, Breast, Cup, Size, Pad, Padding, Cushion, Curve, Figure, Bra, Brasierre, Supportive, Bust, Bustline
item.media:description: More Magazine’s Fashion Market Director, Tara Stewart talks all things swimwear in this video series. From choosing the perfect beachside accessories to the secrets of slimming swimsuits, Tara showcases the season’s most stylish suits for every shape, size and budget. Tara also provides seasonal fashion tips, techniques and trends for the woman of style and substance, courtesy of Lands’ End.

item.title: Women's Swimwear Trends
item.media:keywords: Swimsuit, Swimwear, Bathing suit, Swim, Swimming, Pool, Ocean, Beach, Fashionable, Trendy, Trends, Dress, Skirt, Bikini, Two-piece, One-piece, Straps, Strapless
item.media:description: Are you still wearing that out-of-date swimsuit to the beach year after year? Learn how to update your style!

item.title: Choosing Shoes
item.media:keywords: Shoes, Foot, Footwear, Health, Fitness, Walk, Run, Jog, Athletic, Sole, Heel, Toes, Feet, Arch, Toning, Insoles, Orthodics, Insert
item.media:description: In this video, Certified Pedorthist and Executive Vice President of Aetrex Worldwide, Inc. Matt Schwartz provides an overview of the video series discussing: • Feet & how they work • Foot type, their setbacks & potential solutions • Orthotics • Choosing shoes that look good & feel great

item.title: Choosing a Swim Skirt
item.media:keywords: Swimsuit, Swimwear, Skirt, Swim, Dress, Coverage, Mini, Two-piece, One-piece, Bikini, Top
